plan.text: Set up a Twitter account if not already done
Research and identify reliable AI news sources
Create a system to monitor and collect daily AI trends
Develop a concise format for tweeting AI trends
Schedule daily tweets at optimal times
Engage with followers and the AI community on Twitter
Analyze tweet performance and adjust strategy as needed

questions.label: Do you already have a Twitter account for tweeting AI trends?
How would you rate your current knowledge of AI trends?
How many AI trend tweets do you plan to post daily?

discoveries.title: Twitter engagement is crucial for growing an AI trends account
Consistent daily posting is key to building a following

pipelines.title: Daily AI Trend Tweet Process
steps: Identify top trend of the day
